column6: Limit Violations and Notifications for December 12, 2000

column19: The loss was due to West basis positions, and fixed price length
The loss was due to downward price movements on long January Nymex and December Gas Daily positions
The loss was attributable to decreases in CA South Peak, Palo Verde Peak, Cinergy Peak, Entergy Peak, NY Zone J Peak, and West Hub Peak prices.
East Power was long in multiple regions (Cinergy, Entergy, PJM, New England) and power prices dropped significantly in nearly every month.
